title: Set Up Equation For the Given Condition
text: Since y varies directly as x, the ratio of y to x should be the same all the time. Therefore we get the proportion equation $$\frac{y}{x}=\frac{14}{3}$$. We can simplify the equation by multiplying x both sides which gives $$y=\frac{14}{3} x$$ as the final asnwer.
